channel.title: Training
channel.description:
ok so i added this training zone so my members can level and i added the Npcs there Id is 17 and there are 8 of the in 2 rows of 4..
so when you kill one of the NPC's you just kill them you dont get any Xp what so ever and i wanted to know how to add XP so when you kill the NPC you get XP
